# Construct Energy Ward, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Construct touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 109

As *[[Protection From Energy (Spell)|protection from energy]]*, except that the target must be a construct.
